  • Uses of ISocketProvider in org.freedesktop.dbus

    Methods in org.freedesktop.dbus with parameters of type ISocketProvider
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static FileDescriptor
    FileDescriptor.fromJavaFileDescriptor(FileDescriptor _data, ISocketProvider _provider)
    Utility method to create a DBus FileDescriptor from a FileDescriptor.
    Tries to use the provided ISocketProvider if present first.
    If not present or conversion failed, tries to convert using reflection.
    FileDescriptor
    FileDescriptor.toJavaFileDescriptor(ISocketProvider _provider)
    Converts this DBus FileDescriptor to a FileDescriptor.
    Tries to use the provided ISocketProvider if present first.
